import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function BoardView() { let { id } = useParams(); // JSON 해체 const [board, setBoard] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { let url = process.env.REACT_APP_HOST_IP + "/board/view/" + id; console.log(url); axios .get(url) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); setBoard(res.data); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }, []); // 처음에 한 번 렌더링해라! 라는 의미 return (

내용
{board.contents}

); } export default BoardView;
